sentence.Network_en: Leatherdale was hit resoundingly on the side of the head.
sentence.Network_cn: 莱瑟戴尔头部一侧遭到响亮的一击。

sentence.Network_en: They resoundingly support government programs for the poor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们为政府的扶贫项目提供了巨大支持。
国际贸易仍然成果辉煌。

PerfectNetExp.abs: resounding 响亮的resoundingly 轰动地resource 资源

entry.def: A resounding sound is loud and clear.

example.ex: There was a resounding slap as Andrew struck him violently across the face...
example.tran: 安德鲁狠狠掴了他一巴掌，声音响亮干脆。

example.ex: She got a resounding round of applause...

entry.tran: (成功)彻底的，完全的，辉煌的，巨大的
entry.def: You can refer to a very great success as a resounding success.

example.ex: The good weather helped to make the occasion a resounding success.
example.tran: 天公作美，使得这次活动获得了巨大成功。

sentences.sentence: "he then so resoundingly denounced his former friend"
